titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ziad Mohamed Shaban Khweis, Heyam Ziad Khweis, and Juman Ziad Khweis.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Ziad Mohamed Shaban Khweis, Heyam Ziad Khweis, and Juman Ziad Khweis.
